alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Upper Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 3:10PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Grant County through 345 PM MDT... At 309 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Riverside, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cliff, Buckhorn, Riverside, Gila, Bill Evans Lake, Mogollon Box Campground and Portions of the Gila Wilderness. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Upper Gila River Valley
